projects.title: Career Roadmap
projects.description: Explore the unthinkable Career Opportunities and roadmap and choose your career yourself.

projects.title: Art Gallary
projects.description: An art gallery exhibits the works of many artists. Each artist is given a specified space on the online webpage.

projects.description: Beautiful weather application with forecasts, interactive maps, and location-based recommendations.

projects.description: Comprehensive analytics dashboard for tracking social media performance and engagement metrics.

projects.description: Discover and save your favorite recipes with smart search, meal planning, and nutritional information.

projects.title: BookShop
projects.description: An elegant and responsive Online Bookshop that makes discovering and buying books simple and delightful.

projects.title: News Portal

projects.title: Guess The Country Flag
projects.description: “Guess the Country by Flag” is an interactive and educational game designed to test your knowledge of world flags.

projects.title: Drawing pad
projects.description: A simple and interactive drawing pad that lets users sketch freely using different colors and brush sizes.
